content.en: Algorithmic software management: Researchers have explored various algorithms to improve software project management and estimation. These algorithms include grey relational analysis, cluster analysis, classification methods, ensemble estimation methods, leave-one-out validation, tabu search, support vector regression, machine learning algorithms, and genetic algorithms. The goal is to achieve better accuracy and stability in software effort estimation, as well as to address the impact of data quality on prediction. These findings highlight the potential of using algorithms to enhance software development processes.
content.da: Algoritmisk softwarestyring: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre projektledelse og estimering inden for software. Disse algoritmer inkluderer grå relaktionel analyse, klyngeanalyse, klassifikationsmetoder, ensemble-estimeringsmetoder, leave-one-out validering, tabu-søgning, support-vector-regression, maskinlæringsalgoritmer og genetiske algoritmer. Målet er at opnå bedre nøjagtighed og stabilitet i software-arbejdsindsats estimering, samt at adressere data-kvalitetens indvirkning på forudsigelser. Disse resultater fremhæver potentialet ved at bruge algoritmer til at forbedre softwareudviklingsprocesser.
